select count(*) from qna
QA_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or QA_content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where MB_num=#{MB_num} and QA_del='N'
mapper.update: update qna set QA_refStep=QA_refStep+1 where QA_ref=#{QA_ref} and QA_refStep>#{QA_refStep}
mapper.insert: insert into qna values (#{QA_num}, #{QA_title}, sysdate, #{QA_content}, null, #{QA_ref}, #{QA_refStep}, #{QA_refLevel}, 'N', #{MB_num})
mapper.update: update qna set QA_del='Y' where QA_num=#{num}
mapper.select:
select * from (select a.*, rowNum rn from (select q.*, m.MB_id from qna q, member m where q.MB_num=m.MB_num
QA_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or QA_content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
${search} like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
order by QA_ref desc, QA_refStep) a) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
